00050 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(const char * szKey,bool bCaseSensitive)
00051 {
00052         unsigned int uResult = 0;
00053         if(bCaseSensitive)
00054         {
00055                 while(*szKey)
00056                 {
00057                         uResult += (unsigned char)(*(szKey));
00058                         szKey++;
00059                 }
00060         } else {
00061                 while(*szKey)
00062                 {
00063                         uResult += (unsigned char)tolower(*(szKey));
00064                         szKey++;
00065                 }
00066         }
00067         return uResult;
00068 }
00069 
00073 inline bool kvi_hash_key_equal(const char * szKey1,const char * szKey2,bool bCaseSensitive)
00074 {
00075         if(bCaseSensitive)
00076         {
00077                 while(*szKey1 && *szKey2)
00078                 {
00079                         if(*szKey1 != *szKey2)
00080                                 return false;
00081                         szKey1++;
00082                         szKey2++;
00083                 }
00084         } else {
00085                 while(*szKey1 && *szKey2)
00086                 {
00087                         if(tolower(*szKey1) != tolower(*szKey2))
00088                                 return false;
00089                         szKey1++;
00090                         szKey2++;
00091                 }
00092         }
00093         //check if one of the strings is a substring of the other (like "perl" and "perlcore")
00094         if(*szKey1 || *szKey2)
00095                 return false;
00096         return true;
00097 }
00098 
00102 inline void kvi_hash_key_copy(const char * const &szFrom,const char * &szTo,bool bDeepCopy)
00103 {
00104         if(bDeepCopy)
00105         {
00106 #if defined(COMPILE_ON_WINDOWS)
00107                 // strlen() returns size_t under windows, which is 32 bits long on a 32 bits
00108                 // system and 64 bits long on a 64 bits one. cast it to avoid a warning
00109                 int len = (int)kvi_strLen(szFrom);
00110 #else
00111                 int len = kvi_strLen(szFrom);
00112 #endif
00113                 char * dst = (char *)KviMemory::allocate(len+1);
00114                 KviMemory::copy(dst,szFrom,len+1);
00115                 szTo = dst;
00116         } else {
00117                 szTo = szFrom; // we never modify it anyway
00118         }
00119 }
00120 
00124 inline void kvi_hash_key_destroy(const char * &szKey,bool bDeepCopy)
00125 {
00126         if(bDeepCopy)
00127                 KviMemory::free((char *)szKey);
00128 }

00136         return static_null;

00142 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(const KviCString &szKey,bool bCaseSensitive)
00143 {
00144         unsigned int uResult = 0;
00145         const char * p = szKey.ptr();
00146         if(bCaseSensitive)
00147         {
00148                 while(*p)
00149                 {
00150                         uResult += *((const unsigned char *)p);
00151                         p++;
00152                 }
00153         } else {
00154                 while(*p)
00155                 {
00156                         uResult += tolower(*((const unsigned char *)p));
00157                         p++;
00158                 }
00159         }
00160         return uResult;
00161 }

00167 {
00168         return kvi_hash_key_equal(szKey1.ptr(),szKey2.ptr());
00169 }

00277 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(void * pKey,bool)
00278 {
00279         unsigned char * pBytes = (unsigned char *)&(pKey);
00280         unsigned char * pEnd = pBytes + sizeof(void *);
00281         unsigned int uSum = 0;
00282         while(pBytes < pEnd)
00283         {
00284                 uSum += *pBytes;
00285                 pBytes++;
00286         }
00287         return uSum;
00288 }

00325 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(const QString &szKey,bool bCaseSensitive)
00326 {
00327         unsigned int uResult = 0;
00328         const QChar * p = szKey.constData();
00329         if(!p)return 0;
00330         if(bCaseSensitive)
00331         {
00332                 while(p->unicode())
00333                 {
00334                         uResult += p->unicode();
00335                         p++;
00336                 }
00337         } else {
00338                 while(p->unicode())
00339                 {
00340                         uResult += p->toLower().unicode();
00341                         p++;
00342                 }
00343         }
00344         return uResult;
00345 }
00346 
00350 inline bool kvi_hash_key_equal(const QString &szKey1,const QString &szKey2,bool bCaseSensitive)
00351 {
00352         if(bCaseSensitive)
00353                 return KviQString::equalCS(szKey1,szKey2);
00354         return KviQString::equalCI(szKey1,szKey2);
00355 }

00380 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTable;
00381 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTableIterator;
00382 
00383 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTableEntry
00384 {
00385         friend class KviPointerHashTable<Key,T>;
00386 protected:
00387         T  * pData;
00388         Key  hKey;
00389 public:
00390         Key & key(){ return hKey; };
00391         T * data(){ return pData; };
00392 };
00393 
00433 template<class Key,class T> class KviPointerHashTable
00434 {
00435         friend class KviPointerHashTableIterator<Key,T>;
00436 protected:
00437         KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > ** m_pDataArray;
00438         bool                                                m_bAutoDelete;
00439         unsigned int                                        m_uSize;
00440         unsigned int                                        m_uCount;
00441         bool                                                m_bCaseSensitive;
00442         bool                                                m_bDeepCopyKeys;
00443         unsigned int                                        m_uIteratorIdx;
00444 public:
00453         T * find(const Key & hKey)
00454         {
00455                 m_uIteratorIdx = kvi_hash_hash(hKey,m_bCaseSensitive) % m_uSize;
00456                 if(!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])return 0;
00457                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next())
00458                 {
00459                         if(kvi_hash_key_equal(e->hKey,hKey,m_bCaseSensitive))return (T *)e->pData;
00460                 }
00461                 return 0;
00462         }
00463 
00473         T * operator[](const Key & hKey)
00474         {
00475                 return find(hKey);
00476         }
00477 
00482         unsigned int count() const
00483         {
00484                 return m_uCount;
00485         }
00486 
00491         bool isEmpty() const
00492         {
00493                 return m_uCount == 0;
00494         }
00495 
00506         void insert(const Key & hKey, T * pData)
00507         {
00508                 if(!pData)return;
00509                 unsigned int uEntry = kvi_hash_hash(hKey,m_bCaseSensitive) % m_uSize;
00510                 if(!m_pDataArray[uEntry])
00511                         m_pDataArray[uEntry] = new KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(true);
00512                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->next())
00513                 {
00514                         if(kvi_hash_key_equal(e->hKey,hKey,m_bCaseSensitive))
00515                         {
00516                                 if(!m_bCaseSensitive)
00517                                 {
00518                                         // must change the key too
00519                                         kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00520                                         kvi_hash_key_copy(hKey,e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00521                                 }
00522                                 if(m_bAutoDelete)
00523                                         delete e->pData;
00524                                 e->pData = pData;
00525                                 return;
00526                         }
00527                 }
00528                 KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * n = new KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T>;
00529                 kvi_hash_key_copy(hKey,n->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00530                 n->pData = pData;
00531                 m_pDataArray[uEntry]->append(n);
00532                 m_uCount++;
00533         }
00534 
00546         void replace(const Key & hKey, T * pData)
00547         {
00548                 insert(hKey,pData);
00549         }
00550 
00560         bool remove(const Key & hKey)
00561         {
00562                 unsigned int uEntry = kvi_hash_hash(hKey,m_bCaseSensitive) % m_uSize;
00563                 if(!m_pDataArray[uEntry])return false;
00564                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->next())
00565                 {
00566                         if(kvi_hash_key_equal(e->hKey,hKey,m_bCaseSensitive))
00567                         {
00568                                 kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00569                                 if(m_bAutoDelete)delete ((T *)(e->pData));
00570                                 m_pDataArray[uEntry]->removeRef(e);
00571                                 if(m_pDataArray[uEntry]->isEmpty())
00572                                 {
00573                                         delete m_pDataArray[uEntry];
00574                                         m_pDataArray[uEntry] = 0;
00575                                 }
00576                                 m_uCount--;
00577                                 return true;
00578                         }
00579                 }
00580                 return false;
00581         }
00582 
00592         bool removeRef(const T * pRef)
00593         {
00594                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)
00595                 {
00596                         if(m_pDataArray[i])
00597                         {
00598                                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[i]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[i]->next())
00599                                 {
00600                                         if(e->pData == pRef)
00601                                         {
00602                                                 kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00603                                                 if(m_bAutoDelete)delete ((T *)(e->pData));
00604                                                 m_pDataArray[i]->removeRef(e);
00605                                                 if(m_pDataArray[i]->isEmpty())
00606                                                 {
00607                                                         delete m_pDataArray[i];
00608                                                         m_pDataArray[i] = 0;
00609                                                 }
00610                                                 m_uCount--;
00611                                                 return true;
00612                                         }
00613                                 }
00614                         }
00615                 }
00616                 return false;
00617         }
00618 
00626         void clear()
00627         {
00628                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)
00629                 {
00630                         if(!m_pDataArray[i])
00631                                 continue;
00632 
00633                         while(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[i]->takeFirst())
00634                         {
00635                                 kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00636 
00637                                 if(m_bAutoDelete)
00638                                         delete ((T *)(e->pData));
00639 
00640                                 delete e;
00641 
00642                                 if(!m_pDataArray[i])
00643                                         break; // emptied in the meantime
00644                         }
00645 
00646                         if(m_pDataArray[i])
00647                         {
00648                                 delete m_pDataArray[i];
00649                                 m_pDataArray[i] = 0;
00650                         }
00651                 }
00652                 m_uCount = 0;
00653         }
00654 
00663         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * findRef(const T * pRef)
00664         {
00665                 for(m_uIteratorIdx = 0;m_uIteratorIdx<m_uSize;m_uIteratorIdx++)
00666                 {
00667                         if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])
00668                         {
00669                                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next())
00670                                 {
00671                                         if(e->pData == pRef)return e;
00672                                 }
00673                         }
00674                 }
00675                 return 0;
00676         }
00677 
00685         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * currentEntry()
00686         {
00687                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00688                 if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])return m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->current();
00689                 return 0;
00690         }
00691 
00696         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * firstEntry()
00697         {
00698                 m_uIteratorIdx = 0;
00699                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00700                 {
00701                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00702                 }
00703                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00704                 return m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00705         }
00706 
00714         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * nextEntry()
00715         {
00716                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00717 
00718                 if(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize)
00719                 {
00720                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * t = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next();
00721                         if(t)return t;
00722                 }
00723 
00724                 m_uIteratorIdx++;
00725 
00726                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00727                 {
00728                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00729                 }
00730 
00731                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00732 
00733                 return m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00734 
00735         }
00736 
00744         T * current()
00745         {
00746                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00747                 if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])
00748                 {
00749                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->current();
00750                         if(!e)return 0;
00751                         return e->data();
00752                 }
00753                 return 0;
00754         }
00755 
00763         const Key & currentKey()
00764         {
00765                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
00766                 if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])
00767                 {
00768                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->current();
00769                         if(!e)return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
00770                         return e->key();
00771                 }
00772                 return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
00773         }
00774 
00780         T * first()
00781         {
00782                 m_uIteratorIdx = 0;
00783                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00784                 {
00785                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00786                 }
00787                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00788                 KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00789                 if(!e)return 0;
00790                 return e->data();
00791         }
00792 
00800         T * next()
00801         {
00802                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00803 
00804                 if(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize)
00805                 {
00806                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * t = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next();
00807                         if(t)
00808                         {
00809                                 return t->data();
00810                         }
00811                 }
00812 
00813                 m_uIteratorIdx++;
00814 
00815                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00816                 {
00817                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00818                 }
00819 
00820                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00821 
00822                 KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00823                 if(!e)return 0;
00824                 return e->data();
00825         }
00826 
00837         void copyFrom(KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & t)
00838         {
00839                 clear();
00840                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = t.firstEntry();e;e = t.nextEntry())
00841                         insert(e->key(),e->data());
00842         }
00843 
00851         void insert(KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & t)
00852         {
00853                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = t.firstEntry();e;e = t.nextEntry())
00854                         insert(e->key(),e->data());
00855         }
00856 
00864         void setAutoDelete(bool bAutoDelete)
00865         {
00866                 m_bAutoDelete = bAutoDelete;
00867         }
00868 
00878         KviPointerHashTable(unsigned int uSize = 32, bool bCaseSensitive = true, bool bDeepCopyKeys = true)
00879         {
00880                 m_uCount = 0;
00881                 m_bCaseSensitive = bCaseSensitive;
00882                 m_bAutoDelete = true;
00883                 m_bDeepCopyKeys = bDeepCopyKeys;
00884                 m_uSize = uSize > 0 ? uSize : 32;
00885                 m_pDataArray = new KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > *[m_uSize];
00886                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)m_pDataArray[i] = NULL;
00887         }
00888 
00896         KviPointerHashTable(KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & t)
00897         {
00898                 m_uCount = 0;
00899                 m_bAutoDelete = false;
00900                 m_bCaseSensitive = t.m_bCaseSensitive;
00901                 m_bDeepCopyKeys = t.m_bDeepCopyKeys;
00902                 m_uSize = t.m_uSize;
00903                 m_pDataArray = new KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > *[m_uSize];
00904                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)m_pDataArray[i] = NULL;
00905                 copyFrom(t);
00906         }
00907 
00913         ~KviPointerHashTable()
00914         {
00915                 clear();
00916                 delete [] m_pDataArray;
00917         }
00918 };
00919 
00924 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTableIterator
00925 {
00926 protected:
00927         const KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> * m_pHashTable;
00928         unsigned int                       m_uEntryIndex;
00929         KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > * m_pIterator;
00930 public:
00938         void operator = (const KviPointerHashTableIterator<Key,T> & src)
00939         {
00940                 m_pHashTable = src.m_pHashTable;
00941                 m_uEntryIndex = src.m_uEntryIndex;
00942                 if(src.m_pIterator)
00943                         m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(src.m_pIterator));
00944                 else
00945                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00946         }
00947 
00954         bool moveFirst()
00955         {
00956                 if(m_pIterator)
00957                 {
00958                         delete m_pIterator;
00959                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00960                 }
00961 
00962                 m_uEntryIndex = 0;
00963                 while((m_uEntryIndex < m_pHashTable->m_uSize) && (!(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])))
00964                 {
00965                         m_uEntryIndex++;
00966                 }
00967 
00968                 if(m_uEntryIndex == m_pHashTable->m_uSize)
00969                         return false;
00970 
00971                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
00972                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveFirst();
00973                 if(!bRet)
00974                 {
00975                         delete m_pIterator;
00976                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00977                 }
00978                 return bRet;
00979         }
00980 
00987         bool moveLast()
00988         {
00989                 if(m_pIterator)
00990                 {
00991                         delete m_pIterator;
00992                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00993                 }
00994 
00995                 m_uEntryIndex = m_pHashTable->m_uSize;
00996                 while(m_uEntryIndex > 0)
00997                 {
00998                         m_uEntryIndex--;
00999                         if(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])
01000                         {
01001                                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
01002                                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveLast();
01003                                 if(!bRet)
01004                                 {
01005                                         delete m_pIterator;
01006                                         m_pIterator = NULL;
01007                                 }
01008                                 return bRet;
01009                         }
01010                 }
01011                 return false;
01012         }
01013 
01021         bool moveNext()
01022         {
01023                 if(!m_pIterator)
01024                         return false;
01025                 if(m_pIterator->moveNext())
01026                         return true;
01027                 if(m_pIterator)
01028                 {
01029                         delete m_pIterator;
01030                         m_pIterator = NULL;
01031                 }
01032                 m_uEntryIndex++;
01033                 while((m_uEntryIndex < m_pHashTable->m_uSize) && (!(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])))
01034                 {
01035                         m_uEntryIndex++;
01036                 }
01037                 if(m_uEntryIndex == m_pHashTable->m_uSize)
01038                         return false;
01039                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
01040                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveFirst();
01041                 if(!bRet)
01042                 {
01043                         delete m_pIterator;
01044                         m_pIterator = NULL;
01045                 }
01046                 return bRet;
01047         }
01048 
01057         bool operator ++()
01058         {
01059                 return moveNext();
01060         }
01061 
01070         bool movePrev()
01071         {
01072                 if(!m_pIterator)
01073                         return false;
01074                 if(m_pIterator->movePrev())
01075                         return true;
01076                 if(m_pIterator)
01077                 {
01078                         delete m_pIterator;
01079                         m_pIterator = NULL;
01080                 }
01081                 if(m_uEntryIndex >= m_pHashTable->m_uSize)
01082                         return false;
01083                 while(m_uEntryIndex > 0)
01084                 {
01085                         m_uEntryIndex--;
01086                         if(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])
01087                         {
01088                                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
01089                                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveLast();
01090                                 if(!bRet)
01091                                 {
01092                                         delete m_pIterator;
01093                                         m_pIterator = NULL;
01094                                 }
01095                                 return bRet;
01096                         }
01097                 }
01098                 return false;
01099         }
01100 
01110         bool operator --()
01111         {
01112                 return movePrev();
01113         }
01114 
01122         T * current() const
01123         {
01124                 return m_pIterator ? m_pIterator->current()->data() : NULL;
01125         }
01126 
01134         T * operator *() const
01135         {
01136                 return m_pIterator ? m_pIterator->current()->data() : NULL;
01137         }
01138 
01145         const Key & currentKey() const
01146         {
01147                 if(m_pIterator)
01148                         return m_pIterator->current()->key();
01149                 return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
01150         }
01151 
01158         T * toFirst()
01159         {
01160                 if(!moveFirst())
01161                         return NULL;
01162                 return current();
01163         }
01164 public:
01170         KviPointerHashTableIterator(const KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & hTable)
01171         {
01172                 m_pHashTable = &hTable;
01173                 m_uEntryIndex = 0;
01174                 m_pIterator = NULL;
01175                 moveFirst();
01176         }
01177 
01181         ~KviPointerHashTableIterator()
01182         {
01183                 if(m_pIterator)
01184                         delete m_pIterator;
01185         }
01186 };
